text: The Christian Broadcasting Network is an American conservative and evangelical religious television network. It also makes its own television shows. The network was started in 1960 by the televangelist Pat Robertson. Other people who hosted the show were Miss America 1973 Terry Meeuwsen and Danuta Rylko (now known as Danuta Pfeiffer). One of CBN's main shows is The 700 Club, a religious and news show which has been on CBN since 1966. ==References== Category:Christian media
title: Christian Broadcasting Network
